Settings.Description: OmniMechs are different from BattleMechs in several ways such as their extreme flexibility in loadouts.  Omni hardpoints are a special type of hardpoint that allows any weapon that isnâ€™t for Battle Armor or a Super Weapon to be mounted to the mech.
Battle Armor can mount a limited number of weapons due to their size and general diminutive stature, meaning that Battle Armor suits can only mount special Battle Armor Weapons
Land-Air Mechs come with many unique benefits, one of which is that they are capable of mounting specialized bomb munitions in dedicated bomb bays. These bomb bays are exclusive to LAMs.
BattleMechs can mount many weapons, including special melee weapons such as swords or hatchets. These melee weapons are always hardwired to the chassis and cannot be removed or used elsewhere.

BattleMechs are the kings of the battlefield and even though artillery is most often seen on combat vehicles, some dedicated BattleMechs can also mount such behemoth weapons. The artillery hardpoint is for such weapons.

BattleMechs can mount many kinds of weapons but one class stands out from the rest: the superweapons. These are highly variable as a class, sharing only their large size, heavy weight, and incredible raw power. The superweapon hardpoint is for these unique death-dealers.
